title: Prime Minister of Saudi Arabia - Wikipedia
snippet: Since the reign of King Khalid, ... the 1990s and 2000s. Royal favorites achieved power to become de facto prime ministers. The current one is the King's son Mohammad, who is his father's top aide....

title: Mohammed bin Salman - Wikipedia
snippet: Mohammed bin Salman Al Saud (born 31 August 1985), also known as MbS, is the de facto ruler of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, formally serving as Crown Prince and Prime Minister.
